mods.abstract: Runaway in Prison. Was committed to jail negro JIM, claiming to belong to John Harlin. Huma, [Terrebonne]. Jim is about 38 years old; 5 ft. 6 in. high; stout; wears beard; will weigh about 155 lbs. The owner is hereby notified to reclaim him in the manner required by law. THEO. BLANCHARD, Sheriff
